name: Smurfs' Village
summary: The evil wizard Gargamel and his ever present cat companion, Azrael, have finally found the Smurfs’ village and have scattered our lovable blue friends far and wide throughout the enchanted forest. Come along with familiar friends, like Papa Smurf, Smurfette, Brainy, Jokey, Greedy and the rest of the Smurf family, as they guide you on a family fun adventure to build a new forest village for the Smurfs to call home.
